name: Word Blitz
description: Type falling neon words before they escape to the bottom — faster words, bigger combos, more chaos!
controls: Keyboard: type the falling words to blast them

name: Neon Slicer
description: Swipe and slash through glowing geometric shapes flying across the screen — chain slices for insane combos, but dodge the red bombs!
tagline: Swipe to slice, dodge the bombs!
controls: Mouse drag / touch swipe to slice shapes

name: Vortex Shift
description: Guide a glowing orb that spirals around a central vortex — click to flip inward/outward and thread through rotating neon barrier arcs before they absorb you!
tagline: Flip the spiral, dodge the rings!
controls: Click / Tap / Space to flip spiral direction

name: Chrono Pop
description: Neon circles expand outward from glowing dots — click them precisely when they hit the dashed target ring for perfect scores and chain combos!
tagline: Pop the ring at the perfect moment!
controls: Click / Tap circles when they hit the target ring

name: Circuit Blaze
description: Drag glowing energy lines to connect matching-colored nodes before their countdown expires — chain combos for massive scores but lose a life every time a node burns out!
tagline: Connect the nodes before they burn out!
controls: Click and drag from one node to a matching-color node to connect

name: Plasma Break
description: Guide a neon paddle to bounce a plasma ball through waves of glowing bricks — chain combo hits for multiplied scores, catch WIDE and MULTIBALL power-ups, and clear every brick to advance!
tagline: Smash bricks, chain combos, break free!
controls: Move mouse or touch to control the paddle
